comments:
I had selected 4 breakpoints and hit remove
The breakpoints were installed in a self-hosting target
I had been doing a bunch of HCR on 1.4.1_b11

com.sun.jdi.InternalException: Got error code in reply: 41
	at org.eclipse.jdi.internal.MirrorImpl.defaultReplyErrorHandler
(MirrorImpl.java:255)

(EventRequestImpl.java:187)

The problem here is that we don't handle this error code. When we try to 
delete a request, and the VM replies that the request is gone, we should smile 
and say "Great."

Added code to EventImpl and EventManagerImpl to handle this case.

Two classes changed were EventRequestManagerImpl and EventRequestImpl not 
EventImpl and EventManagerImpl.

Verified.
